edu.calstatela.sawooope.gamestates.levels

Class BoardEntityManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.calstatela.sawooope.gamestates.levels.BoardEntityManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntityMapping

    public class BoardEntityManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements EntityMapping
    Board Entity Manager handles how entities in the game are stored, accessed, updated and drawn.
    Author:
    Benji
